extracted_playbook.title: Review and Validate Authorized Users
extracted_playbook.description: Review and validate the list of users who are authorized and who can authenticate to Emalytics.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Physical Access
extracted_playbook.description: Allow only trained and trusted persons to have physical access to the system, including devices that have connection to the system through the Ethernet port.

extracted_playbook.title: Operate Devices in Secure Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Operate network-capable devices in closed networks or protect them with a suitable firewall.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult Application Note for Network Protection
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to the application note Art.-Nr. 107913: AH EN INDUSTRIAL SECURITY for detailed recommendations on protecting network-capable devices with Ethernet connection against unauthorized access.
